critique: The document is a formal amendment to an executive order. It discusses the allocation of funds for the purchase of forest lands within National Forest Purchase Units. The language is formal and bureaucratic. There is no explicit expression of emotions such as joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise. Given the nature of the document, the intensity of any emotion conveyed is likely to be very low. Therefore, I will assign a score of 1 for each emotion.
